author: vors
body:
- [x] Use tag-based package names #1615
## Prepare the switch to public

Put these package in the public myget.org feed
- [x] MMI, mshtml and other pre-build packages from psl-windows-build
- [x] Our SDK and dependencies
- [x] do `nuget.config` update from #1160)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I believe this was definitely done.

title: Nuget packages feed (prepare switch to public)
